attributes.action: Put a lifesize statue of Enoch Powell in the entrance of the Palace of Westminster.
attributes.additional_details: Now that Tory ministers have acknowledged the he is the ONLY politician to have spoken the truth about the dangers of immigration, we need to rehabilitate him and put a statue of him in the entrance to the Palace of Westminster and make it a condition of entry that all elected politicians bow to it before being allowed on to the floor of the Chamber.
